akn:section.akn:heading: Applicability of other provisions to D.C. Federal Pension Fund.

akn:content.akn:p: Section 1-805.03(b) (relating to the repayment by the District Government of costs attributable to errors or omissions in transferred records).
Section 1-807.04 (relating to the treatment of the Trust Fund under certain laws).

Section 1-813.01 (relating to annual valuations and reports by the enrolled actuary), except that in applying ยง 1-813.01(b) to the D.C. Federal Pension Fund, the annual report required under such section shall include a determination of the annual payment to the D.C. Federal Pension Fund under ยง 1-817.04.
Section 1-813.02 (relating to reports by the Comptroller General).
Section 1-815.04 (relating to the treatment of misappropriation of Trust Fund amounts as a Federal crime).
